item.title: Report X-2024070044
item.description:
Report X-2024070044

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-03T15:13:24+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-21
  • City: MINNEAPOLIS
  • State: MN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On June 20th during the unloading of a ULD, a gas odor was noticed. A package marked as UN1992 Engine Internal Combustion, flammable liquid powered, 3 was discovered having a leak. Opening the package confirmed that the engine inside leaked some of it's contents. the package was placed into a salvage drum and the shipper was contacted for disposition.
